name: Reduced-Threat Glabrezu
resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.Magic Resistance: The glabrezu has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.Multiattack: The glabrezu makes four attacks: two with its pincers and two with its fists. Alternatively, it makes two attacks with its pincers and casts one spell.
actions.Pincer: Melee Weapon Attack: +7+1d8 + 3 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape DC 13+1d8 + 9). The glabrezu has two pincers, each of which can grapple only one target.
actions.Fist: Melee Weapon Attack: +7+1d8 + 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage.
